snippet: The bomber, a man, was wearing a woman’s head-to-toe burqa to deceive guards.
abstract: Man dressed in woman's burqa to dupe guards carries out suicide bomb attack on mosque in southwest Pakistan, killing 10 people, including six children.
lead_paragraph: The bomber, a man, was wearing a woman’s head-to-toe burqa to deceive guards.

headline.print_headline: Asia; Pakistan: Bombing at Mosque Kills at Least 10 People
headline.main: Pakistan: Bombing at Mosque Kills at Least 10 People
